Description: Engagement Multiplier is an employee engagement platform created to make a company more productive, more profitable, and easier to run.
Name: Engagement Multiplier

Methods.Name: Update Employee
Methods.Description: Updates an employee of a specified company.

Methods.Name: Get Employee by Email
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single employee by email address.  Leaves through the True Exit if single record found, else through the False Exit.

Methods.Name: Create Employee
Methods.Description: Creates an employee for a specified company.

Methods.Name: List Employees
Methods.Description: Lists employees of a specified company.

Methods.Name: List New Employees
Methods.Description: Lists employees of a specified company, created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Employees
Methods.Description: Lists employees of a specified company, updated since the last run.
